name: Gaspard's fishing extravaganza
description:
Little Gaspard is late for his barbecue and worst of all… EMPTY HANDED !

This dreadful lack of maners simply won’t do !

Help our eponymous hero collect as many fish as he can by skillfuly wielding his trusty old fishing rod ! 

But beware! Fish can be mighty oponents and who knows what tremendous dangers may lurks in this mirky pound… 

Hold the space bar to prepare a mighty toss, and again to wind up the line! 

Collect as many fish as you can to become the barbecue star, but be careful, supplies are limited! 

Some tip : target the mouth !

Good luck!
